original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 327.50/328.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 327.50/328.00 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 327.40/90 the previous day, dealers said.
The Colombo Stock Exchange opened up with the All Share Price Index up 0.10 percent at 10,710.
The S&P SL20 was up 0.14 at 3,058. Turnover was t 115 million within the first half hour of trading.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 13.95/14.05 percent from 13.90/14.00 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.10/25 percent from 14.10/20 percent.
